1.1.1: NewEmail component does not need https://mail.google.com/ scope
1.1.2: Scope for all components reviewed and minimized.
1.2.0: Added attachments in outPorts of GetEmail and NewEmail.
2.0.0: Added minimal scopes to DeleteLabel, DeleteEmail, CreateDraft, CreateLabel.
Removed the scope of https://mail.google.com from DeleteLabel, DeleteEmail, CreateDraft, CreateLabel.
Breaking change - removal of account from `connected accounts` and re-authentication of Gmail account will be required
